--总量 start DECLARE @oldmonthtotal DECIMAL(38,5),@newmonthtotal DECIMAL(38,5),@oldtotal DECIMAL(38,5),@newtotal DECIMAL(38,5),@date VARCHAR(20),@oldYearStart varchar(20),@newYearStart varchar(20),@oldYearEnd varchar(20),@newYearEnd varchar(20) SET @date='$yyyyMm$' if(len(@date)=0) SET @date=CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),getdate(),120) else if(len(@date)<8) SET @date=@date+'-01' --以9月为开始 年YTD if(convert(INT,substring(@date,6,2))>=9) begin SET @oldYearStart = CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), CONVERT(INT ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(4),@date,120))-1)+'-09-01' SET @oldYearEnd = dateadd(ms,-3,DATEADD(mm, DATEDIFF(m,0,CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), CONVERT(INT ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(4),@date,120))-1)+substring(CONVERT(VARCHAR(7),@date,120),5,7)+'-01')+1, 0)) SET @newYearStart = CONVERT(VARCHAR(4),@date,120)+'-09-01' SET @newYearEnd=dateadd(ms,-3,DATEADD(mm, DATEDIFF(m,0,@date)+1, 0)) end else begin SET @oldYearStart = CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), CONVERT(INT ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(4),@date,120))-2)+'-09-01' SET @oldYearEnd = dateadd(ms,-3,DATEADD(mm, DATEDIFF(m,0,CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), CONVERT(INT ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(4),@date,120))-1)+substring(CONVERT(VARCHAR(7),@date,120),5,7)+'-01')+1, 0)) SET @newYearStart = CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), CONVERT(INT ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(4),@date,120))-1)+'-09-01' SET @newYearEnd=dateadd(ms,-3,DATEADD(mm, DATEDIFF(m,0,@date)+1, 0)) end
SET @oldmonthtotal=isnull((SELECT sum(BOX) FROM RPT_DATA_SALE r_d_sale LEFT JOIN MDM_STORE store ON (r_d_sale.TARGET_STORE_CODE=store.STORE_CODE) LEFT JOIN BASE_ORG org ON (store.ORG_ID=org.ORG_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND r_d_sale.TARGET_STORE_CODE is not null $subCode$ $bannerIds$ AND r_d_sale.BILL_DATE>=CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), CONVERT(INT ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(4),@date,120))-1)+substring(CONVERT(VARCHAR(7),@date,120),5,7)+'-01' AND r_d_sale.BILL_DATE<=dateadd(ms,-3,DATEADD(mm, DATEDIFF(m,0,CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), CONVERT(INT ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(4),@date,120))-1)+substring(CONVERT(VARCHAR(7),@date,120),5,7)+'-01')+1, 0))),0.0)/100 SET @newmonthtotal=isnull((SELECT sum(BOX) FROM RPT_DATA_SALE r_d_sale LEFT JOIN MDM_STORE store ON (r_d_sale.TARGET_STORE_CODE=store.STORE_CODE) LEFT JOIN BASE_ORG org ON (store.ORG_ID=org.ORG_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND r_d_sale.TARGET_STORE_CODE is not null $subCode$ $bannerIds$ AND r_d_sale.BILL_DATE>= CONVERT(VARCHAR(7),@date,120)+'-01' AND r_d_sale.BILL_DATE<=dateadd(ms,-3,DATEADD(mm, DATEDIFF(m,0,@date)+1, 0))),0.0)/100 SET @oldtotal=isnull((SELECT sum(BOX)FROM RPT_DATA_SALE r_d_sale LEFT JOIN MDM_STORE store ON (r_d_sale.TARGET_STORE_CODE=store.STORE_CODE) LEFT JOIN BASE_ORG org ON (store.ORG_ID=org.ORG_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND r_d_sale.TARGET_STORE_CODE is not null $subCode$ $bannerIds$ AND r_d_sale.BILL_DATE>=CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), CONVERT(INT ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(4),@date,120))-1)+'-01-01' AND r_d_sale.BILL_DATE<=CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), CONVERT(INT ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(4),@date,120))-1)+'-12-31 23:59:59'),0.0) /100 SET @newtotal=isnull((SELECT sum(BOX)FROM RPT_DATA_SALE r_d_sale LEFT JOIN MDM_STORE store ON (r_d_sale.TARGET_STORE_CODE=store.STORE_CODE) LEFT JOIN BASE_ORG org ON (store.ORG_ID=org.ORG_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND r_d_sale.TARGET_STORE_CODE is not null $subCode$ $bannerIds$ AND r_d_sale.BILL_DATE>=CONVERT(VARCHAR(4),@date,120)+'-01-01' AND r_d_sale.BILL_DATE<=CONVERT(VARCHAR(4),@date,120)+'-12-31 23:59:59'),0.0) /100
SELECT '1','Grand Total','Grand Total',@oldmonthtotal,@newmonthtotal ,CASE WHEN @newmonthtotal=0 THEN '-' WHEN @oldmonthtotal=0 THEN '<font color=green>NEW</font>' WHEN (@newmonthtotal-@oldmonthtotal)<0 THEN '<font color=red>'+CAST(CAST( ((@newmonthtotal-@oldmonthtotal)*100/@oldmonthtotal ) AS decimal(38,0)) AS VARCHAR)+'%</font>' ELSE CAST(CAST( ((@newmonthtotal-@oldmonthtotal)*100/@oldmonthtotal ) AS decimal(38,0)) AS VARCHAR)+'%' END ,@oldtotal,@newtotal ,CASE WHEN @newtotal=0 THEN '-' WHEN @oldtotal=0 THEN '<font color=green>NEW</font>' WHEN (@newtotal-@oldtotal)<0 THEN '<font color=red>'+CAST(CAST( ((@newtotal-@oldtotal)*100/@oldtotal ) AS decimal(38,0)) AS VARCHAR)+'%</font>' ELSE CAST(CAST( ((@newtotal-@oldtotal)*100/@oldtotal ) AS decimal(38,0)) AS VARCHAR)+'%' END UNION ALL --门店性质 统计start SELECT banners.totalName,banners.ITEM_NAME,banners.ITEM_NAME ,isnull(oldBannerMonth.oldMonthTotal,0.0) AS oldMonthTotal,isnull(newBannerMonth.newMonthTotal,0.0) AS newMonthTotal
,CASE WHEN isnull(newBannerMonth.newMonthTotal,0)=0 THEN '-' WHEN isnull(oldBannerMonth.oldMonthTotal,0)=0 THEN '<font color=green>NEW</font>' WHEN (newMonthTotal-oldMonthTotal)<0 THEN '<font color=red>'+CAST(CAST( ((newMonthTotal-oldMonthTotal)*100/oldMonthTotal ) AS decimal(38,0)) AS VARCHAR)+'%</font>' ELSE CAST(CAST( ((newMonthTotal-oldMonthTotal)*100/oldMonthTotal ) AS decimal(38,0)) AS VARCHAR)+'%' END
,isnull(oldBannerYear.oldYearTotal,0.0) AS oldYearTotal,isnull(newBannerYear.newYearTotal,0.0) AS newYearTotal
,CASE WHEN isnull(newBannerYear.newYearTotal,0)=0 THEN '-' WHEN isnull(oldBannerYear.oldYearTotal,0)=0 THEN '<font color=green>NEW</font>' WHEN (newYearTotal-oldYearTotal)<0 THEN '<font color=red>'+CAST(CAST( ((newYearTotal-oldYearTotal)*100/oldYearTotal ) AS decimal(38,0)) AS VARCHAR)+'%</font>' ELSE CAST(CAST( ((newYearTotal-oldYearTotal)*100/oldYearTotal ) AS decimal(38,0)) AS VARCHAR)+'%' END
FROM ( SELECT 'Grand Total' AS totalName,banner.ITEM_NAME,banner.DICT_ITEM_ID FROM RPT_DATA_SALE r_d_sale INNER JOIN MDM_STORE store ON (r_d_sale.TARGET_STORE_CODE=store.STORE_CODE) LEFT JOIN BASE_DICT_ITEM banner ON (store.CORP_ID=banner.DICT_ITEM_ID) LEFT JOIN BASE_ORG org ON (store.ORG_ID=org.ORG_ID) where 1=1 AND r_d_sale.TARGET_STORE_CODE is not null $subCode$ $bannerIds$
GROUP BY banner.DICT_ITEM_ID,banner.ITEM_NAME ) banners LEFT JOIN ( --去年 当月统计 SELECT sum(r_d_sale.BOX)/100 AS oldMonthTotal,banner.DICT_ITEM_ID FROM RPT_DATA_SALE r_d_sale LEFT JOIN MDM_STORE store ON (r_d_sale.TARGET_STORE_CODE=store.STORE_CODE ) LEFT JOIN BASE_DICT_ITEM banner ON (store.CORP_ID=banner.DICT_ITEM_ID) LEFT JOIN BASE_ORG org ON (store.ORG_ID=org.ORG_ID)
WHERE r_d_sale.BILL_DATE>=CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), CONVERT(INT ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(4),@date,120))-1)+substring(CONVERT(VARCHAR(7),@date,120),5,7)+'-01' AND r_d_sale.BILL_DATE<=dateadd(ms,-3,DATEADD(mm, DATEDIFF(m,0,CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), CONVERT(INT ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(4),@date,120))-1)+substring(CONVERT(VARCHAR(7),@date,120),5,7)+'-01')+1, 0)) $subCode$ $bannerIds$
GROUP BY banner.DICT_ITEM_ID,banner.ITEM_NAME )oldBannerMonth ON (banners.DICT_ITEM_ID=oldBannerMonth.DICT_ITEM_ID) LEFT JOIN ( --今年 当月统计 SELECT sum(r_d_sale.BOX)/100 AS newMonthTotal,banner.DICT_ITEM_ID FROM RPT_DATA_SALE r_d_sale LEFT JOIN MDM_STORE store ON (r_d_sale.TARGET_STORE_CODE=store.STORE_CODE) LEFT JOIN BASE_DICT_ITEM banner ON (store.CORP_ID=banner.DICT_ITEM_ID) LEFT JOIN BASE_ORG org ON (store.ORG_ID=org.ORG_ID)
WHERE r_d_sale.BILL_DATE>=CONVERT(VARCHAR(7),@date,120)+'-01' AND r_d_sale.BILL_DATE<=dateadd(ms,-3,DATEADD(mm, DATEDIFF(m,0,@date)+1, 0)) $subCode$ $bannerIds$
GROUP BY banner.DICT_ITEM_ID,banner.ITEM_NAME )newBannerMonth ON (banners.DICT_ITEM_ID=newBannerMonth.DICT_ITEM_ID) LEFT JOIN ( --去年 1月到当月 SELECT sum(r_d_sale.BOX)/100 AS oldYearTotal,banner.DICT_ITEM_ID FROM RPT_DATA_SALE r_d_sale LEFT JOIN MDM_STORE store ON (r_d_sale.TARGET_STORE_CODE=store.STORE_CODE) LEFT JOIN BASE_DICT_ITEM banner ON (store.CORP_ID=banner.DICT_ITEM_ID) LEFT JOIN BASE_ORG org ON (store.ORG_ID=org.ORG_ID)
WHERE r_d_sale.BILL_DATE>=@oldYearStart AND r_d_sale.BILL_DATE<=@oldYearEnd $subCode$ $bannerIds$
GROUP BY banner.DICT_ITEM_ID,banner.ITEM_NAME )oldBannerYear ON (banners.DICT_ITEM_ID=oldBannerYear.DICT_ITEM_ID) LEFT JOIN ( --今年 1月到当月 SELECT sum(r_d_sale.BOX)/100 AS newYearTotal,banner.DICT_ITEM_ID FROM RPT_DATA_SALE r_d_sale LEFT JOIN MDM_STORE store ON (r_d_sale.TARGET_STORE_CODE=store.STORE_CODE) LEFT JOIN BASE_DICT_ITEM banner ON (store.CORP_ID=banner.DICT_ITEM_ID) LEFT JOIN BASE_ORG org ON (store.ORG_ID=org.ORG_ID)
WHERE r_d_sale.BILL_DATE>=@newYearStart AND r_d_sale.BILL_DATE<=@newYearEnd $subCode$ $bannerIds$
GROUP BY banner.DICT_ITEM_ID,banner.ITEM_NAME
)newBannerYear ON (banners.DICT_ITEM_ID=newBannerYear.DICT_ITEM_ID)
